body.name: Wooden Dough Bowl - Dark Burnt Acacia Wood Rustic Dough Bowl - Handmade Decorative Bowls for Home Decor, Bathroom, Kitchen Counter, & More - Large Wood Dough Bowl for Decor, Cosmetics, and Keys
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Sunday, February 18 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 2 hrs 41 mins
features: WOODEN DOUGH BOWL: Elevate your space with our wood bowl. This large decorative bowl comes in a unique burnt wood finish that adds a touch of warmth to any space. Experience the beauty of imperfections in this one-of-a-kind wooden bowls for decor.

FUNCTIONAL ELEGANCE: This key bowl for entryway table is a functional and artistic addition to your home. Our table centerpieces can be used for decoration on tabletops, in bathrooms, dressing rooms, and more to store and display any items such as jewelry, watches, cosmetics, and more.

HAND-CARVED: Our wood centerpieces for tables are carefully hand-carved from premium acacia wood, ensuring exquisite craftsmanship. Built to be durable and long-lasting, this wood decor bowl is not food-safe and ensures strength and longevity when used with dry foods or storage items.

VERSATILE DESIGN: Keep your bath or dressing table accessories out for easy access in these wooden dough bowls for decor. Our wood bowls are perfect for the entryway to drop in your keys or other tidbits whenever you come back home.

GREAT GIFT IDEA: These key bowls for entry table are ideal for gifting and seamlessly complement any room decor. This center table decor bowl measures 17"L x 3" H x 8" W and its timeless appeal makes it a perfect display piece for both classic homes and farmhouse-style settings.
body.description: LuxeDesigns Decorative Bowls for Centerpieces: Our centerpiece bowl is a piece of modern elegance that will transform your home decor. The burnt wood finish decor bowl lends an inviting warmth, making it an exceptional addition to any space. These rustic table decor dough bowls aren't just decorative items, the wood centerpiece bowl for keys is a versatile masterpiece that can serve as a striking centerpiece on your dining table, an eye-catching fruit holder in your kitchen, or an elegant catch-all for keys and everyday essentials on your entryway console. Create a cozy ambiance with this dough bowl decor. Made from naturally sourced acacia wood for decorative purposes, our rustic centerpieces for tables are great for dressing tables, kitchen counters, bathroom entryways, or stylish storage for trinkets and accessories. Embrace the artistry of handmade decor and transform your home into a haven of style and sophistication with this wooden decorative bowl for keys. --- Decorative Wooden Bowl Specifications: Made from acacia wood - Great for boho home decoration - Natural, handmade – Entryway Bowl for Keys Dimensions: 17"L x 3" H x 8" W. --- About Us: All LuxeDesigns products support fair trade through an extensive program that preserves Indian craftsmanship and promotes the welfare of communities throughout the country. We are so confident in the quality of our products that we offer a no questions asked, money-back assurance if you are not satisfied with them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The craftsmanship is exceptional, showcasing the natural beauty of the wood grain in a way that adds warmth and character to my home decor. The bowl's size is perfect for various uses; I will use it as a stunning centerpiece on my dining table, filled with decorative items or fresh fruits. Its authenticity as a handcrafted piece brings a sense of nostalgia that I adore. Moreover, the bowl is durable and feels sturdy, assuring me it will last for years to come. The packaging was excellent, ensuring it arrived in pristine condition. I couldn't be happier with this purchase and highly recommend this wooden dough bowl to anyone looking for a charming and versatile addition to their home.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Heavy in a good way. Very high quality! Looks great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Versatile and well made
reviews.reviewText: I originally bought this product to use with rolls at dinner. Then I decided to use it in the bathroom with a soap dispenser and disposable towels. It is made very well. I added small rubber feet to keep it from moving around on the counter. I’m very pleased with the item and the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Solid bowl for decor
reviews.reviewText: This is a beautifully finished dough bowl with a nice heft to it. Purchased to display crystal spheres, it looks lovely for that purpose. I do wish it were slightly larger, but that’s my own fault for having a too-large collection

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Definitely worth the price
reviews.reviewText: I don’t usually write reviews but felt compelled on this product. It’s beautiful! Well made and very sturdy, heavy. Color is beautiful and packaged extremely well . So happy with this purchase. Buy it! You will not be sorry

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I’m very happy with this; it has a nice smooth finish for those who don’t want a primitive look but still want to use a dough bowl in decorating. The smaller size offered was perfect for my current needs as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gorgeous and versatile
reviews.reviewText: I ordered three bowls from this shop, and this one is my favorite! I love it’s shape. It has good weight to it (doesn’t feel cheap), and the grain of the wood is beautiful. It’s a versatile decorative bowl that you could use in pretty much any room of the house. I currently have mine on the bathroom counter for toiletries, but it’s so pretty that I may move it somewhere more visible like the living room.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love it
reviews.reviewText: I have no complaints. It's beautiful and well made. Heavy-duty and will last forever.
